definitions.definition: A sketch or account of anything in words; a portraiture or representation in language; an enumeration of the essential qualities of a thing or species.
examples: give a verbal description of the events

definitions.definition: The act of describing ; a delineation by marks or signs.
A set of characteristics by which someone or something can be recognized .
examples: The zoo had no lions, tigers, or cats of any description .

definitions.definition: A scientific documentation of a taxon for the purpose of introducing it to science.
examples: The type description of the fungus was written by a botanist.

definitions.definition: The act or practice of recording and describing actual language usage in a given speech community , as opposed to prescription , i.e. laying down norms of language usage.

main_definition: A sketch or account of anything in words; a portraiture or representation in language; an enumeration of the essential qualities of a thing or species.
secondary_definitions: The act of describing ; a delineation by marks or signs.
A set of characteristics by which someone or something can be recognized .
( taxonomy ) A scientific documentation of a taxon for the purpose of introducing it to science.
( linguistics ) The act or practice of recording and describing actual language usage in a given speech community , as opposed to prescription , i.e. laying down norms of language usage.
